com.bham.bd.components.triggers

Class RespawnTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.BaseGameEntity
      • com.bham.bd.components.triggers.Trigger
        • com.bham.bd.components.triggers.RespawnTrigger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtraInfo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArmorTrigger, BombTrigger, Freeze, HealthGiver, Immune, InverseTrap, LandmineTrigger, SpeedTrigger, StateTrigger, TeleportTrigger, TripleBullet

    public abstract class RespawnTrigger
extends Trigger
    The category of trigger that it is triggered but then becomes inactive for a specified amount of time. These values control the amount of time required to pass before the trigger becomes active once more.

        public Rectangle getHitBox()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the hit-box of the entity

        Hit-box is a shape with size and location properties. In most cases it is either a circle or a rectangle.

      • getHitBoxRadius

        public double getHitBoxRadius()
        Description copied from class: BaseGameEntity
        Gets the outer radius of the hit-box

        If it's a circle it gets its radius, if its any other shape, it gets the radius of the outer circle that would be generated around the hit-box.

        Specified by:
        getHitBoxRadius in class BaseGameEntity
        Returns:
        size of hit-box radius
